name: Subscription Tracker
description: An intuitive subscription tracker built to put you back in control of recurring expenses. Whether it's streaming services, utility bills, or business tools, this planner ensures you know exactly where your money goes each month—with no surprises.

sections.title: One Place for Every Subscription
sections.text: Record all your subscriptions with ease—amount, due date, category, and frequency. No more digging through emails or statements. It's all in one view.

sections.title: Subscription Analytics Dashboard
